subject: Re: [junit] fake console class
msgSnippet: Refactor your app so it doesn t depend directly on java.io.Console, but instead depends on your own interface with similar methods, for example foo.bar.IO.

ins=
tead depends on your own interface with similar methods, for example

r.IO. Pass an instance of IO via a constructor or setter (DI) and
supply a =
mock instance for testing and a Console-backed one in production.
